title: Think we can agree that Flex rank is another Riot fail chapter.
body:
So you would think that after the fix that Riot said will fix Flex rank placement and match making you would believe it is a good thing right?

Won my pathetic 1 game that Riot judge me and and got gold 4 when I finish placement vsing Diamond/master and got plat 4 that was 7/3 for me LMAO.

My sister who got plat 4 and was in promo too and she had 8/2 if i recall did her 1 game placement match and got SILVER 2 LMAO HOLY and at that time when she did win her she was 15/5 which would at least get her gold near platinum but NOOOOOOPE Riot pathetic fix seem like it was done by a guy who stayed over night to get it fix in 1 day.

I just can't see how this so called hot fix was even something good at all and how Flex rank can be even called a rank system at all. 

What rank did you guys get after your 1 game judgement game and do you think Flex Q is another failed chapter in Riot Dynamic duo book?

replies.body:
Look at you, pretending like the preseason isn't an experimental time of year for everyone involved. Heaven forbid something doesn't go right and all the shits were to be had. 

It all resets anyway. Flipping out over nothing gains nothing to you except your own frustration.

> It all resets anyway. Flipping out over nothing gains nothing to you except your own frustration.

....Flex Q was experimental time? My bad I thought experimental time was done after it took 1 year for Dynamic duo to be over and secretly renamed to flex LOL.

Ya I understand reset but when players like me get 7-8/3-2 you usually suspect we get automatic gold which is like Solo Q and that is what happen if you even start off new in rank, you get gold with those scores so you don't usually think after placement for flex you get platinum and by 1 trash game even though you win you end up getting silver LOL.

It may be a rebrand of Dynamic Queue, but that doesn't mean it's the same. It's a separate queue from solo/duo they made clear about that. I think there should be some parallel in mmr but that doesn't seem to be the case. Especially with how wonky it was shipped as. 

Also assuming you'll get placed in gold from simple win/loss ratio is silly. I went 7/3 on this account and started in silver 2. There's a lot more to it that that.
Unless they ban duos from solo queue, flex is bound to fail. Good luck getting people to fill in the trios when the duos will be busy getting boosted in solo.
